name: digger
title: Digger
description: Like dig but for the web. Comprehensive website intelligence and metadata extraction.
author: chrismessina

commands.name: digger
commands.title: Digger
commands.subtitle: Digger
commands.description: Get comprehensive website intelligence and metadata

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
